channel.title: Npc attacks
channel.description: on my server the only time the npc attacks you is when your right next to him and you click attack. other then that they just sit there. i want to know how to make them attack back and follow u to a certain point when you run away.

@issac wrote:

on my server the only time the npc attacks you is when your right next to him and you click attack. other then that they just sit there. i want to know how to make them attack back and follow u to a certain point when you run away.
